We are making great progress towards a safe effective COVID-19 vaccine. Medical professionals in Congress are leading by example and volunteering for these trials because we trust the science. https://t.co/3eSbMZU8B3

I’m honored to be awarded the Guardian of Small Business award by the by the @nfib. These job creators are the backbone of our economy and I’m proud of the entrepreneurs in TN and around the country. #smallbizguardian

A vaccine is our way back to normal – here's why it will be safe: vaccine candidates in the final stage of trials are going through randomized double-blind placebo-controlled multicenter studies. Before final approval it would be approved by an independent group of experts.

This week members of the GOP Doctors Caucus joined together in condemning Governor Cuomo’s suggestion that Americans not take an Operation Warp Speed vaccine. This is not only ignorant it’s dangerous. Safe effective vaccines save lives and offer a path back to normalcy.

Great progress from Operation Warp Speed this week! Using the existing infrastructure of CVS and Walgreens as soon as a vaccine is approved by the FDA we’ll be able to quickly make it available for our vulnerable seniors in long-term care facilities.

MYTH: The vaccine may be distributed without FDA approval.  FACT: The vaccine will only be distributed after achieving every stage of research and trials that every other vaccine has gone through. https://t.co/np1cR8sdRp
MYTH: The government will force you to take the COVID-19 vaccine.  FACT: We do not have mandatory vaccinations and this one will be no different. https://t.co/cgoXSH7v2y

MYTH: Vaccine research is being rushed by politics threatening safety and effectiveness.  FACT: Any vaccine that receives approval will have met the same rigorous safety and effectiveness protocol as any other drug that the FDA considers. https://t.co/PqwBTfNeYR

I’ll say it as many times as it takes: I am grateful to people like Dr. Slaoui who are giving up their lives and livelihoods to help ensure our society can defeat the invisible enemy once and for all.
Desperate smear attempts like this serve no purpose and cause our best and brightest to prefer to stay on the sidelines.

We’re at a crucial moment in our nation’s fight against COVID-19 standing at the precipice of developing a vaccine that will enable us to return to normal. The scientific progress we’ve made has been nothing short of a miracle and Dr. Slaoui has been instrumental in this effort

This December will be 50 yrs since I graduated medical school. I don’t remember a time in my life where we found an infectious disease where within 8 months we had cut the mortality rate by over 40%. That is literally unheard of. We've learned a lot and will beat this virus soon. https://t.co/DmOTpZ5xRl

We want a safe effective vaccine like we have for polio. I remember as a boy when the polio vaccine came out literally overnight we eliminated polio as a risk. Many of my friends developed polio before the vaccine was available but I was lucky. We'll beat COVID-19 too. https://t.co/S5I46NxVks

Enough is enough. Liberal activists are trying to destroy America. Turning America into a socialist nation won’t change history but it will destroy our future. We cannot – we will not – allow this to happen.

As a soldier I fought for the freedoms our country holds dear – freedoms that were secured because of the foresight of our founding fathers. We honor them for securing those freedoms.

To cut downtime without cutting corners we’re overlapping steps.   Typically the process goes:  Clinical trial ➡️ FDA approval ➡️ production   OWS has these steps occur simultaneously with the govt covering production costs that companies usually wouldn’t risk until approval. https://t.co/Ggz87VBLOU

We should honor those whose commitment to life liberty and the pursuit of happiness paved the way for an America that is more free and more hopeful than at any other time in human history.

Every new generation has improved our country over the previous one and we should celebrate their advancements. But when you look around the world it’s impossible to find a nation that has done more to defeat tyranny secure liberty and free people from the bonds of oppression.

Our Founders knew that the Constitution by securing our inalienable rights would allow America to continually improve. We celebrate our Founders not because they were perfect men but because they established a country that would strive to be great.
“…in order to form a more perfect union…”   As we approach Independence Day we have more reason than ever before to reflect on what our Founders intended when they wrote our Constitution.
Defunding the police is possibly the single worst idea I’ve heard in my life. Now is the time for thoughtful reforms and dialogue – not policy based on slogans.

I’m encouraged by actions being taken to bring about accountability transparency and improved performance to our nation’s law enforcement. President Trump’s executive order today is a good step to put into place broadly-supported changes.

Looking back on his life we should all be thankful for Sam Johnson’s relentless heart of service. This is a huge loss for the great state of Texas and it was an honor to serve with him.
I remember how he had difficulty punching his voting card on the House floor because he had been injured so badly in the war but he always showed up for his country.

Sam told me that when the military was testing the effects of nuclear explosions on planes he volunteered to fly over 5 nuclear explosions. Sam went on to become a respected conservative leader in Congress.

After being shot down in Vietnam in 1966 Sam was taken prisoner and tortured for nearly 7 YEARS – including 2.5 years spent in leg irons. After all that he immediately showed up in line reporting for duty.

My heart breaks for the loss of my former colleague and a true American hero Sam Johnson. Sam flew 62 missions as a Thunderbird the Air Force’s world-renowned precision flying demonstration team during the Korean War and 25 missions during the Vietnam War.
